This is a rendering of hmtl files from the course repository  (https://github.com/jeffreyblanchard/HumGen2022R) for Human Genome Analysis taught at the University of Massachusetts Amherst by Prof. Jeffrey Blanchard.  If you are not using RStudio Cloud here are [directions](HumGen_github.html) for creating a RStudio project space that is in sync with the course github and will download the files in the course repo.

* Lab 1 : [Introduction to R and Reproducible Research](HumGen_Lab1_intro.html)
